item.title: Edinburgh Data Science Meetup
item.description:
Recently I gave a presentation at the Edinburgh Data Science Meetup on time-series forecasting. In particular, comparing the differences between traditional methods such as ARIMA and Exponential Smoothing with the latest Deep Learning models. Hopefully I will turn these into blog posts in the coming months, but in the meantime you can download the presentation here.

⬇️ Download Full PDF
